HumanID Hello blank fragment mdb. You’re logged in anonymously with humanID Welcome to %s Continue with (recommended for full privacy) I hereby agree to MovieDB’s Terms of Service humanID confirms your phone number without
sharing it with %s.
Your data is permanently deleted after verification. Phone Number humanID gives you back control over your privacy. The non profit organization authenticates you without sharing your data or retaining your data.\nLearn More Cancel Transfer account to new number? Manage & monitor all your logins & data with the humanID app humanID is the independent & open online ID - giving back privacy, and the internet, to humans. Learn About Our Mission Switching Number Let’s transfer your humanID to a new number. First , let’s verify your new phone number Enter your code Please enter your old number and email Your Email Resend code Resend code in %s We just sent a text to %s. We will not save or forward this number after the verification Please enter the 4 digit code you received as SMS Call me Instead This will sign you out of all sessions across all devices We sent confirmation code to email, please click link or enter code: Learn About Our Mission //Label Success //Hint Your email address //Action Try different number Save Skip & Risk of losing your account close & Return to Movie DB Call me instead Create new account REcover account from my old number Return to movie db This is a new number - this is not my account Enter humanID is the independent & open online ID - giving back privacy, and the internet, to humans. Learn About Our Mission This will sign you out of all sessions across all devices //Title Create a new account For Your Security New Device Phone number has been change Last Step - For Your Security Switching Number //Message Welcome to humanID - the independent, non-profit sign-in. \n Register securely by confirming your phone number. It is deleted after verification and never communicated to platforms! Please enter your email address to recover access in case you lose your phone number Confirmation:
Yes, I can access and recall We don’t recognize your device - please verify your number The phone number on your account has been successfully changed and encrypted. You can now again login to your previous accounts across all services. To make sure we got the right account, please type your email address Understood, so you did not previously use humanID with //Sub Message In case I have to recover my humanID login in the future Please enter the 4 digit code you received as SMS to +1 617 999 9999 Ensure to enter an address you can access and remember! Only a non-readable encryption will be saved Please enter the 4 digit code you received via SMS Please enter the 4 digit code you received via SMS to Let’s get your setup: //Format +%s %s //Error Field Required Enter a valid email Please enter numbers Input code correctly Try again in 00 : 28 Are you sure? Without your email address, we cannot recover your accounts in case you lose access to your phone number , or don’t use your humanID for more than 90 days. When you provide your email, we don’t keep it. we only save a non-readable encryption. Imagine the email address as your keys - we only borrow it to build a “lock” that only you can open Don’t trust us? You don’t have to! We are a nonprofit foundation with no financial interest in your data. Our software is open source, for everyone to look at, and verified by industrial specialists. Your data is never safed on our servers , or handed to our partner platforms Learn more about humanID back We just sent a text to %s. We will not save or forward this number after the verification Please enter the 4 digit code you received via SMS We sent confirmation code to email, please click link or enter code: This will sign you out of all sessions across all devices Learn More Enter your code Please wait I hereby agree to %s\'s Terms of Service Unable to request otp at this time. Please try again later Request otp failed Processing Login succeeded - Phone number not stored Unable to reach the humanID Service at this time Verify otp failed Cancel Verification Number Invalid phone numbers
